ygData.subject: Re: Armours Trade
ygData.msgSnippet: Err, then can wiz wear banded, netted and patch work? Btw, Leshrec went over to Freeport liao.  I wonder how he go there? hehe. On Monday, May 24, 1999 8:15
ygData.messageBody:
Err, then can wiz wear banded, netted and patch work?

Btw, Leshrec went over to Freeport liao. I wonder how he go there? hehe.

On Monday, May 24, 1999 8:15 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> Value for money is banded 'cos it cheap enough but not all char class
can use it, eg Monk, Mages.
>
> Netted is just like Patch Work in terms of AC but with the weight of
cloth. And it's magical, meaning that a Monk wearing the gloves will be
able to hit wisp unlike the other class (eg warrior or paladin, paladin at
lvl 15 get to cast a spell to summon a magic hammer, 1h bashing.)
> ----- Original Message -----
